message: Let's split fairly, Bob.  I think this is a good deal for both of us to avoid further losses from inflation.
I appreciate your fairness, Alice. However, I believe a more even split is possible before inflation takes a bigger bite out of our gains. Let's be more equitable this round.
Bob, let's be realistic. Inflation is eating away at our potential gains. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical solution. Take it or leave it.
